title: lOgavana chathura
sahitya:
lOkAvana catura pAhi mAm



anupallavi



 sAkEtAdhipa sarasa gunApramEya sarasijAsana 

sanandana vanditAnghra yuga pada nirjita muni shApa



caraNam 1



 rAkAbja mukha parAkA cEntaku rAka tanakOrva taramA pAkAri vinuta 

nI kAsinciti gAka nE nanya mencanu nIdu vADanayya rAmayya

   

caraNam 2



 nIlAkrti gala nI lAvaNyamu nIlAgani kanupimpavE bAlArkAbha  

sucEla vrta nannElukona manasu rAdika tALa jAla nyAyamA rAma

   

caraNam 3



 cEpAdiga padi rUpAlanu konu cApAlankrta sundara avanIpAd-bhutamagu 

nI pAdamE gati shrIpatE varada pAlita tyAgarAja sArva bhaumAkhila
